slug.description: Optimized URL slug for the post.

content.description: Full text content of the post.

excerpt.description: A brief summary of the post content.

focusKeyword.description: Primary keyword that the post targets for SEO.

metaDescription.description: Summary used in search engine results to improve visibility.

readabilityScore.description: Overall readability assessment of the content.

focusKeywordUsage.description: Indicates if the focus keyword is used appropriately in the content.

metaDescriptionLength.description: Character count of the meta description.

titleLength.description: Character count of the post title.

recommendations.description: List of recommendations to improve SEO and content quality.

updateMetaDescription.description: Indicates if the meta description should be updated.

addFocusKeyword.description: Indicates if a focus keyword should be added.

modifyTitle.description: Indicates if the post title needs to be modified.
